Installation Instructions¶

Learning Simulator runs with Python 3 and uses the packages tkinter and matplotlib.

Python Dependencies¶

Learning Simulator has the following dependencies (note that the version numbers below indicate the versions with which Learning Simulator is tested):

  • Python >= 3.6

  • tkinter >= 8.6

  • matplotlib: >= 2.1.1

You can use pip or conda to install tkinter and matplotlib. However, tkinter usually comes bundled with Python.
